amendment.description: Amendment sought to delay the development of the new long-range nuclear-capable bomber by ten years and to reduce the funding in the bill for the bomber by $291,742,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 112-485 to delay the development of the new long-range nuclear-capable bomber by ten years and the funding in the bill would be reduced by $291,742,000, which is the amount planned for this bomber.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 112 - 308 (Roll no. 268).
